about_the_game:
Intitally designed by Czech Aircraft Works and still in production with Czech Sport Aircraft, the CSA SportCruiser is a low-wing two-seat aircraft with a single engine and tricycle undercarriage. Engines up to 120 horsepower can be fitted, giving this light-sport/ultralight aircraft a possible cruising speed of 133mph (214km/h) and a range up to 630 miles (1,014km).

Developed by Alabeo, the CSA SportCruiser is a fast, light aircraft which is incredibly pleasant to fly. Why not take it for a spin around your nearest GA airport or try some daring maneuvers over your favorite coastline?

Features:

  • High quality HD textures
  • Alabeo GNS530 integrated avionics system
  • Material shines and reflections.
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Gauge reflections
  • Window scratches and blade shines
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Blank texture for creating your own designs
  • Realistic flight behaviour

Developed by Alabeo, the CSA SportCruiser is a fast, light aircraft which is incredibly pleasant to fly. Why not take it for a spin around your nearest GA airport or try some daring maneuvers over your favorite coastline?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features
